product_name: Serengeti Guiliana Polarized Sunglasses - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Boasting sleek, feminine style, the Serengeti Giuliana Polarized Sunglasses have photochromic lenses to adapt to changing light and sturdy spring hinges for great flexibility and a comfortable fit. Photochromic lenses automatically adjust tint according to light conditions; lenses darken in bright light and lighten when there's less light. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Lightweight yet sturdy nylon frames are built to withstand everyday use; spring hinges provide a secure, comfortable fit. Closeout.
short_description: Boasting sleek, feminine style, the Serengeti Giuliana Polarized Sunglasses have photochromic lenses to adapt to changing light and sturdy spring hinges for great flexibility and a comfortable fit.
